pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======Ganglia=======A library to send metric to Ganglia in python.Supports UDP, multicast, group and spoofing.Installing==========To install : :: pip install gangliaUsage=====Sending metric over UDP: :: ganglia = GMetric("udp://127.0.0.1") ganglia.send( name='hits', units='req/sec', type='uint8', value=200, tmax=60, dmax=300, group='web' )
